name: Legendary Sword
description:
Note: the game is experiencing first, and the content is extremely scarce. See the description for details. If it does not meet the expectations, please do not buy it.
You can be anyone here. When a farmer farms and breeds livestock, goes out hunting in the sun, sneaks into the castle at night as a thief, or takes your most handy weapon and puts on a good armor to fight the enemy. Finally, take the booty home or sell it.

characteristic:
-First person / third person perspective
-More real medieval life
-Single person and P2P multiplayer to be launched later
-Open world exploration
-Construction / operation
-A branch line with many reward tasks
